item.description:
Most everyone wishes for peace in their hearts and minds. A great desire of many people is for there to be peace among peoples, nations, and individuals. What can each of us, individually, actually do on a daily basis that helps to bring about this reality? There are spiritual practices that actually transform individuals into beings that live in peace, and these individuals have a profound impact on their communities, neighborhoods, workplaces, and contribute in a substantial way toward peace in the world. Come join Mother Clare Watts as she describes the practices of the mystics that help bring peace to the earth, in a realistic and practical way.

 

about the Presenter

Mother Clare Watts is a Master Teacher and director of the Sophia Peace Center in Dolores, Colorado, a non-profit organization dedicated to providing support for other non-profits who are working to make our world a better, more peaceful place.  Mother Clare has been a professional midwife and activist, a Jungian-trained psychotherapist, a homesteader, wife, mother of four grown children. She was raised by Baptist missionaries, has studied in yoga ashrams and a Sufi training school, and is now also a co-director of the Order of Christ/Sophia, a Mystical Christian order that operates spiritual schools across the country called the Centers of Light. She is a true Teacher and is an expert on practical spirituality. She is in New Haven for three days, and her seminars are not to be missed.
